website_summaries.verdict: Combines a bottom compartment that opens like a suitcase and a top compartment for the easy access of a duffel.
pros: Fits in the overhead bin of most planes
2 spaces makes for easy organization of clothing
Can hold a week's worth of clothing
Also comes in larger 32" and 36" sizes
cons: The bottom of this bag is rigid and does not collapse like most duffels

customer_reviews.title: Don't pack it full if you want to carry on
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag. I've seen others with this set up at Marshall's and Costco for much cheaper, but they didnt look as sturdy/durable as the material of this bag does. The MAJOR downside to it is that despite the company giving carry on dimensions, it does not easily fit in the overhead bin if you pack it to capacity. I had to pack it well for a trip to Haiti for the first use, and it definitely drew the attention of the airline staff. I realized today I missed the return window. I guess I'll have to gift it to someone or pack less.
customer_reviews.author: MD CNM

customer_reviews.title: The ONE thing you actually want to work...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag based on good reviews and reasonable price. However, the wheel bearing was very loose on one of the wheels. The wheel is the one thing you do NOT want to break on a rolling bag, but based on the poor tolerances, it would likely be the first thing to go. I shipped it back for a replacement, but the second one had the same issue, so I'm concluding the wheels are just normally of poor quality. Returned the second one for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: IgnoringMyWife

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece of Luggage, but.......
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 star rating but I was disappointed to find that the bag will not stand up on it's own. I read some of other reviews that stated that you have to pack it right. Well, I packed a lot and it still wouldn't stand up on its own. I actually love the bag; it's sturdy, the zippers are strong, and I love the option to split the bag into 2 sections or have it as 1 large compartment. And, the wheels are very study. The only complaint is what I mentioned earlier. I don't know how the company can fix this and still leave the design of the bag as is.
customer_reviews.author: Deneen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: James Bond's carryon
customer_reviews.text: This is based many trips: I stuffed it to the gills and was impressed that it didn't tilt over. It has numerous zip pockets all around and inside. It has the ability to zip and divide the interior into 2 parts which can be accessed separately so you don't have to unload numerous things from only 1 place. Extremely happy with the multiple access points, handle and wheels. I'm going to buy the larger check in version for when I travel for longer durations. Absolutely love the quality and look of it too!
customer_reviews.author: Deevan

customer_reviews.title: This is rubbish as a traveling companion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a European trip. It will not stay upright on its own and with a small bag on the pulling arm it’s natural attitude is horizontal. I found it so difficult to use that I abandoned it after first leg to NY.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Good, durable bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Very well made and a lot of space. ONLY issue I have found aggregating is that they (neither the 22” or the 26”) will stand up without support. They fall over onto the top of the bag section. Not a big deal unless your waiting for parking shuttle and the lot is wet. Then it becomes very aggravating. Other than the one complaint, these bags are very nice! Roll well and have extremely heavy duty zippers. I expect a long life out of these bags. Expensive, but worth the price even if they don’t stand on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my wife. She loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She loves it. She picked this luggage to haul her roller derby gear. She likes the two main separate compartments. It helps keep her safety pads & skates divided from her jersey's & clothing & tools.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rabino

customer_reviews.title: Pathfinder 22" duffle bag is the absolute best
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bag. I did my research and have found this bag to be well worth the money. Excellent design, double pull zippers. Numerous compartments allow for easy organization of your stuff. You can use it as a regular duffle or take advantage of the handle and wheels. I highly recommend this duffle bag.
customer_reviews.author: joshbenmichael

customer_reviews.title: Zipper died
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty darn good for almost a year of moderate use but now the zipper broke. For this price point it should have bulletproof YKK zippers IMO. It is also kind of annoying that it can’t easily stand up on its own without falling over. Darn good bag otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. A bit large for today's carry on standards (at least with Delta). I purchased this bag not realizing that it does not expand like the other 3 sizes. With that being said it's a great addition to my 32" pathfinder bag. I've only had this bag for a week so I cannot comment on durability, but my 32" has held up like a champ through rain, snow, and general abuse that I throw at most things.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Not an Ordinary Bag !
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great to pack clothing and stuff for a week traveling plan. Is a little bit bigger than your normal backpack but is very well design for traveling between airports. Materials are excellent quality, it does not weight to much, and the many pockets will make more organized. You will love this Bag !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag, Nice Features
customer_reviews.text: It was a really great bag, but I’m returning it because it is too large for what would work for me. I believe the measurements qualify as a carry-on, but once filled, I would not have the muscle to lift it overhead. I really liked the outside pockets. Everything about it seemed great. I'm just a weakling.
customer_reviews.author: HillTen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and practical
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and practical, I find stowing my clothing and some gear in this duffel bag satisfying. If manufacturer could find a way to add two more wheels to convert it into a spinner, that would be the ultimage duffel.
customer_reviews.author: Achilles G. Rances

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely great travel bag! It holds enough for two weeks of travel plus is lightweight and easy to handle. I absolutely love it. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for the price. My complaint is this, It will not stand up when full. Falls forward constantly if you don't lean it up against something. You also can't stack another bag on top of it since its soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it on one trip but it was perfect for my needs. I ordered the 22” model and but returned it only because I thought it was too small so I reordered the 26” and it was right size. The zippers are very smooth with plenty of pockets to store items. Overall I am extremely happy with this purchase. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very well made rolling duffle bag
customer_reviews.text: Good Qality well made spacious. Looks like it will fit in airline overhead compartment. I bought this for my 18 year old son who will be going away to college next year. He liked it very much. Hopefully it will last and give him lots of use. It seems to be well made. I will report back if any problems arise.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the bag a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag a lot; well constructed with lots of compartments and pockets. Zippers are well made and should hold up a long time. The only thing is that it won't stand up by itself with my computer backpack on top. My old case, also a pathfinder that lasted 10+ years was able to stand with a bag on top. This needs to lean against something. Not that big of a deal, but maybe not a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: edge7

customer_reviews.title: Just opened it up but looks good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully will provide an update once I've had a chance to use it but the initial feel is the quality is spot on. Like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: New2this

customer_reviews.title: Very good Quality!!! I loved it... ❤
customer_reviews.text: Its little bit hard to fit in a small airplane when it is 100% full... but fits okay when 80 ,90% full.
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo S Junior

customer_reviews.title: It's a luggage with lots of cloth compartments
customer_reviews.text: It's nicely sized, but I returned this one for the 36in. I needed more space.
customer_reviews.author: WLH

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for travel. Fabric is heavy duty so it won’t rip or tear easily. The thing I don’t like is it’s not stiff when standing upright so it leans or falls forward if not propped against something. But it has plenty of inside storage and outside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: SmallTownOhio

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimzy
customer_reviews.text: Ease of moving but too flimzy! difficult to stand upright
customer_reviews.author: JesseHouston

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: "Excellent rolling duffle! Very sturdy with a handle that can “handle” any situation! Lots of pockets, strong material, and a good size for carry on if not overpacked. The product was shipped very fast! These are excellent travel bags in any size! I would definitely buy again. "
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed zipper
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great for the first few months then the zipper broke.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD D.

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy Mid-sized Bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bag that fit in-between my small weekender and the giant rolling duffel. I like duffel-style bags with the "c" shaped opening, plus a lower compartment. This bag was exactly what I wanted for a good price. I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but I'm impressed with its sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: cwied

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Can easily pack enough for 7-10 days ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Can easily pack enough for 7-10 days in this bag and it can be carried on rather than checked. Lots of separate compartments and the separated top/bottom spaces make it really easy to organize clothes. Very happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: LDR04

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice carry-on bag. Holds plenty and fits well in the overhead bin of jets larger than the smaller regionals.
customer_reviews.author: John Kumm

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bag I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and been using for about a week. This is the best bag I have ever owned! I should have gotten it a long time ago
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Huge! I can cram so much stuff in here for my travel. Use it weekly and so far so good. Unique too. I haven't seen another one yet during my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my busy husband. Works really well with his 2-3 day long trips. Great for carry on. He's tall so the pull handle works well for him. Great quality and would recommend to anyone that needs a sturdy travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn from Cali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a great suitcase for a great price. Very good material, great size and color.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M Mullins

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied with product. If any problems with quality will add to post later. Used for travel sometimes pulling thrugh rough parking lots and it appears to work good at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag but is actually a little big for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag but is actually a little big for a carry on. Had trouble on a couple of airlines getting it in the overhead bin...it's a little long. I will use it more for traveling by car.
customer_reviews.author: V.Bell

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out design
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed travel case which replaced one of a set of Pathfinder pieces we have due to the wheels finally rotting off. Can't understand why the company went out of business.
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be lighter for a carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected however the case is very heavy for a carry-on.I have had no real problem getting it to stand up as long as I pack it with the heavier things at the wheel end of the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: J Michael Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I travel frequently and have several bulky items including a pair of boots. This is the perfect size for me to carry on without checking a bag for multiple day trips. The only downside is that it only has two wheels, if it had four like many of the upright carry on bags it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Luggage will NOT stand up!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag will NOT stand up! If you want to be constantly be propping your bag up then purchase this item. I would NOT recommend to anyone that is a frequent traveler!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Niemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag. Easy to travel as a carry on
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag. Easy to travel as a carry on. Being a duffle bag style makes it convenient to stuff in the overhead bins on the airplanes
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Tips over, doesn't fit much into it & the way it closes at the top is very limiting
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this version of Pathfinder. Have a different model and it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... husband who is very picky about his luggage and happy to say it is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband who is very picky about his luggage and happy to say it is a keeper! He loves the drop bottom on this.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice piece of luggage and it fits our needs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior piece of luggage ...so many zippered pockets". Even though it is a duffle, it can open line a regular piece of luggage,
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shilts

customer_reviews.title: Super tough goods
customer_reviews.text: Super tough goods. I now own three Pathfinders, a 36, 26, 22. All the workmanship is above average, while material is super tough.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bag...i would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Haven't used it yet. Will amend this review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: helaine clem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag is solid. Met all expectations for my travel needs.
customer_reviews.author: Renardo T. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy carry-on with plenty of space for 5 days
customer_reviews.text: I travel a ton and need to optimize the carryon and this was by far the best bag for me. Has a hard time standing up on its own if you put a second briefcase or back back on it but is a great sturdy travel bag and you can get a ton of stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pathfinder Gear 22 Inch Rolling Drop Bottom Duffel, Olive, One Size
feature_bullets: Oversized main compartment with top access and zippered panel separates the lower drop bottom compartment
Heavy duty one touch push-button handle with ergonomic comfort grip. Twin hauling handles and top neoprene handle for easy lifting.
Oversized corner mounted wheels offer maximum durability over all terrain.
Gusset front pocket with 2 separate sections and tie down straps in the bottom compartment.
Rugged oversized self-repairing coil zippers with T bar pulls for easy use in any element.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
